meanings.definition: Making or having a harsh, grating sound
meanings.sent1: The stridulous noise of the old door hinges woke up the entire house.
meanings.sent2: The stridulous sound of the chalk scratching the blackboard was unbearable.
meanings.sent3: The stridulous creaking of the rusty swing set added a spooky touch to the abandoned playground.
meanings.sent4: The stridulous screech of the car brakes echoed through the quiet street.
meanings.sent5: The stridulous howl of the wind during the storm made it hard to sleep.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or producing a high-pitched, shrill noise
meanings.sent1: The stridulous cry of the baby bird caught the attention of its mother.
meanings.sent2: The stridulous whistle of the tea kettle signaled that the water was boiling.
meanings.sent3: The stridulous laughter of the children playing in the park filled the air with joy.
meanings.sent4: The stridulous alarm clock jolted him awake every morning.
meanings.sent5: The stridulous tone of her voice made it clear she was not happy.
